name: SearchCloud
overview: SearchCloud, a new search engine that launched on July 17, has a new take on search refinement that it hopes will make it a useful alternative to the likes of Yahoo and Google. Instead of simply entering multiple keywords, users can rank how important each term is to the search. Each term is placed in a â€œsearch cloudâ€, where its weight is indicated by the size of the font.
